I agree, I have been waiting for a month or 2 to see if they would do so but I imagine they are not. I would have never purchased this pack and stuck with vanilla

I keep checking on syclone’s Twitter posts and he claims that chroma hills updating issues are a marketplace issue and It’s out of his hands. Sometimes some of the nether upstate thru 1.19 textures load in properly, but that’s less than 1% of the time. Pretty frustrating.

Agree. It’s a paid texture pack and it just is being abandoned. Meanwhile it looks Cyclone has been putting out new texture packs. It just ruins the experience having an incomplete world and it’s even worse when you know they are working on other projects. I’d never purchase anything from them again.

I feel they should have another use, not just cosmetics.

The wings should have another use other than purely cosmetics.

Hello, Switch and Android user. I will spawn in the game with everything as it should be, no issues, no lag, no errors, but the more I progress like unlocking biomes, the game performance decreases and it gets more laggy, for example, items take a while to drop, villagers and other animals move slower and jump slower, the minecarts aren't fast like they are in the trailer, the music takes longer to play each time, emerald chests repeat the same animation serveral times, everything delays the more I level up in the game. I'm not sure how to fix this or what to do, please help.

For suggestions or issues with third party content, please contact the content creators directly. Most likely, Minecoins cannot be refunded.

ADD THE TITAN DRAGON TO THE DLC! Plus other dragons from the HtTYD (How to Train Your Dragon-) series, like the Flightmare, Boneknapper, Speed Stinger, and etc. Maybe also the things or ways that can make your dragon a titan dragon. (sorry if there are any errors, I'm really bad at grammar)

I love the HTTYD too, but I think it really needs species-specific color differentiation, considering all the various colors of common dragons we saw in the second movie. also, it would be even better if it could be taken farther through breeding for specific colors. and a glitch keeps happening where my dragons will be permanently unable to dive after picking up a sheep or fish, even after dropping it. I am really frustrated with this, because the only Light Fury I can have is stuck, soaring/gliding to the ground from high places. I also agree that the template SERIOUSLY needs way more dragons. Like, think 4-10 more species. I am very happy with it already, and these updates would be the icing on the cake for me and so many other users, I am sure. Thanks!

As "this idea is based on the premise of having multiples of a single item", I updated your header to reflect that. Thanks for your contribution.
